title: "KPMG Survey: Momentum for Generative AI Continues to Build in Organizations"
excerpt: "The enthusiasm for generative AI is translating into significant increases in related tech investments. According to the KPMG study, a majority (80%) of respondents said they anticipate increasing their investments in generative AI by more than 50% in the next six months to a year. 45% say it will more than double."
